data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mahony, Stephen, Sengupta, Saibal, Kamei, Rachunliu G. (2011): A new low altitude species of Megophrys Kuhl and van Hasselt (Amphibia: Megophryidae), from Assam, Northeast India. Zootaxa 3059: 36-46, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.278921
